EmailTemplate.name: Seminar Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMEMBER your Consultation Appointment with ClearChoice Dental
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Just a quick reminder about your reservation to attend the FREE patient seminar at ClearChoice Dental Implant Center on {!Lead.Well_Formatted_Date__c} at {!Lead.Well_Formatted_Time__c}.
We have reserved a seat for you at the seminar to hear our doctors and team. You will also receive a free 3D CAT scan.
We do request a call at {!Lead.Center_Phone_Number__c} to verbally confirm that you will be at this seminar. If something has come up and you can't make it, please notify us know within 48 hours so that we can offer the time to another patient. You may also respond to this email.
Best regards,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Dental Implant Consultant
ClearChoice Dental Implant Center {!Lead.Center_Address__c}
